              Português  
            
            
              English  
            
            
            Welcome to my website! My name is Claudiano Neto, and I am an economist. I obtained my Ph.D. in Economics at the University of Brasilia (UNB), Brazil. Currently, I am an Assistant Professor at the Center of Agrarian Sciences, Environmental and Biological at Federal University of Recôncavo da Bahia. My research interests includes Environmental and Natural Resource Economics, Methods for the Environmental Valuation, Water allocation and Water Pricing, Public Policy Evaluation. If you need some help, and you think i could help you, please let me know.
            
            If you want to contact me, the best way is by email or via Twitter!
            
            
            
             Interests 
            Data analysis/Economics
            Programming in R
            Environmental Economics
            Conservation
            
            
             Education 
            
            PhD in Economics, 2018, University of Brasilia
            
            
            Master’s degree in Environment and Regional development, 2009, State University of Santa Cruz
            
            
            Bachelor of Economics, 2006, State University of Santa Cruz
